newsitem.title: UK: ICI shares boosted by U.S. buying.
newsitem.headline: ICI shares boosted by U.S. buying.

text.p: Shares in Imperial Chemical Industries Plc gained ground on Monday, helped by gains in the company's American Depository Receipt(ADR)listing in New York last week, dealers said.
Bear Stearns started coverage of the stock on Friday with a "buy" rating, boosting ICI shares in the U.S.
The stock was also recommended by Britain's Independent on Sunday newspaper, which said the rebalancing of the company's asset base could boost its share performance.
"ICI is very much a business which is rebalancing itself," the Independent said. "There are still arguments to buy the shares in anticipation of the improvements this will yield."
The shares were 16p firmer to 933-1/2 by 0915 GMT.
